hanzi-su-wiki:
飾

Значения

Украшать, наряжать, приукрашивать

Мнемоника

Трапеза 食 в украшенной тканями 巾 зале и в присутствии слуг 人.

Варианты

饰, 餝
purpleculture_pinyin:
shì
decoration; ornament; to decorate; to adorn; to hide; to conceal (a fault); excuse (to hide a fault); to play a role (in opera); to impersonate
украшение; орнамент; декорировать; украшать; прятаться; скрыть (недостаток); отговорка (чтобы скрыть ошибку); сыграть роль (в опере); выдавать себя за

heisig_chinese_memo: We decorate a table laying a towel on it and keep ornaments in the room to make for a nice place to eat. Then we add recliners instead of that regular uncomfortable kitchen table chair nonsense.
heisig_constituent: decorate, eat, food, umbrella, good, halo, drop, silver, reclining, lying down, towel
koohiiStory1: [decorate; ornament; adorn; embellish] We decorate a table before eating, reclining a towel over it.
koohiiStory2: Naked sushi: a lady reclining on a towel as decoration for the food laid out on her.
jp_example_words:
着飾る(きかざる): to dress up
首飾り(くびかざり): necklace
修飾(しゅうしょく): ornamentation, embellishment, decoration, adornment, polish up (writing), modification (gram)
装飾(そうしょく): ornament
飾り(かざり): decoration
飾る(かざる): decorate
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: When you eat you want to see the shape of your gun from under a towel, so you decorate your house with them.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Just picture it: an entire home decorated top to bottom with guns covered in towels, so only the outline shows. As your guests try to eat you say, "Guess what gun this is?! Haha, you got it wrong, pull the towel back."
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: If you actually decorate your house like this it will give people quite a shock (しょく). In fact, they might be so shocked they run out of there screaming.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Maybe you should be more conscious of other people when you decorate. Or at least, don't shock people into fainting or yelling or leaving. Guns do that, you know?
Ru_Radicals: 一 (один), ノ, 巾 (тряпка), 食 (еда)
Ru_trainchinese: shì: (графема) украшать, декорировать; прикрывать; исполнять роль; шлифовать (текст); украшение
Kanshudo_mnemonic: you eat (飠) the man's (𠂉) turban (巾) because it's decorated
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: One of my favorite ornaments is a funny little statue of myself reclined on my chair, food on my belly, and still wrapped in my shower towel.
humanum_full_description_en:
From " towel " from " person " to " food " sound. The original meaning is to wipe. "Said the text": "Decoration, 㕞 also. From the towel from the person, eating sound. Read Ruo style." "Shi Ming. "Shi Yanyu": "Decoration, wipe it. Those who are dirty, wipe it out." Such as "Zhou Li. Land official. Entitlement": "Everyone who sacrifices to worship and decorates his cattle and animals." Zheng Xuan's note: "Decoration means that it is clean and clean."

" Decoration " extended to mean dress up and decoration. Such as "Han Feizi. "Eight Traitors": "The owner of the Lemei Palace Room Taichi, so as to decorate the children and horses to entertain their hearts, this owner also suffers." "Lu Shi Chunqiu. "Shen Wei": "The crown is decorated with the head, and the clothing is decorated with the body."

" Decoration " also refers to articles and ornaments used for decoration. Such as "Poetry. Zheng Feng. "Lao Qiu": "Lao Qiu and leopard ornaments, Kong Wu is powerful." "Mo Zi. "Ciguo": "It must be lavishly garnered by the people, robbing the people of food and clothing, thinking that the palaces and houses are straight and straight, and they are decorated with green and yellow carvings."

" Pretend " also means cover up, cover up. Such as "Zuo Zhuan. "Eighteenth Year of Wengong": "The Shaoxun family has talented scholars, destroys faith and loyalty, and worships evil words." "Historical Records. "Tian Jingzhong Ends the Family": "So Qi Guo was terrified, everyone did not dare to play faults and do their best."

" Decorated " on " ordered " that means dressing. Such as "Pipe. Herdsman: "The guardianship of the country is playing the four dimensions." "The twenty-five years of Xianggong": "The ancients have passed Xiaoyi, Xiaoyi will decorate the city and please sin." Fan Ning's note: "The one who decorates the city, repairs the defense."
humanum_short_description_en: From " towel " from " person " to " food " sound. The original meaning is to wipe.
humanum_full_description:
從「巾」從「人」，「食」聲。本義是刷拭。《說文》：「飾，㕞也。从巾从人，食聲。讀若式。」《釋名．釋言語》：「飾，拭也。物穢者，拭其上使明。」如《周禮．地官．封人》：「凡祭祀，飾其牛牲。」鄭玄注：「飾，謂刷治潔清之也。」

　　「飾」引申表示裝扮、修飾。如《韓非子．八姦》：「人主樂美宮室臺池，好飾子女狗馬以娛其心，此人主之殃也。」《呂氏春秋．審為》：「冠所以飾首也，衣所以飾身也。」

　　「飾」又表示用以修飾的物品、飾物。如《詩．鄭風．羔裘》：「羔裘豹飾，孔武有力。」《墨子．辭過》：「必厚作歛於百姓，暴奪民衣食之財，以為宮室臺榭曲直之望，青黃刻鏤之飾。」

　　「飾」也表示掩飾、遮掩。如《左傳．文公十八年》：「少暭氏有不才子，毀信廢忠，崇飾惡言。」《史記．田敬仲完世家》：「於是齊國震懼，人人不敢飾非，務盡其誠。」

　　「飾」通「飭」，表示修整。如《管子．牧民》：「守國之度，在飾四維。」《春秋穀梁傳．襄公二十五年》：「古者大國過小邑，小邑必飾城而請罪。」范甯注：「飾城者，脩守備。」
humanum_short_description: 從「巾」從「人」，「食」聲。本義是刷拭。

飾字的基本解释

飾
shì
见“饰”。

飾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［shì］
［《廣韻》賞職切，入職，書。］
“饰1”的繁体字。“飭2”的被通假字。亦作“餙1”。亦作“餝1”。
(1)拭。
(2)修饰；装饰。
(3)给衣领衣袖滚边。
(4)指袖口。
(5)服饰。
(6)饰品；首饰。
(7)指宝物。
(8)《庄子·马蹄》：“前有橛飾之患。”成玄英疏：“橛，銜也。謂以寶物飾於鑣也。”陆德明释文：“司馬云：'排銜也。'謂加飾於馬鑣也。”遂借指马口中的衔。
(9)粉饰；伪装。
(10)犹致力。
(11)表现，显示。
(12)表彰；奖饰。
(13)被覆。
(14)扮演。
[②]［chì］
［《集韻》蓄力切，入職，徹。］
“饰2”的繁体字。通“飭1”。亦作“餙2”。
(1)整治；整顿。
(2)端正；谨慎。
(3)戒备。

飾字的康熙字典解释

【戌集下】【食字部】　飾； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1418第42
【廣韻】賞職切【集韻】【韻會】設職切，?音識。【玉篇】修飾也。【逸雅】飾，拭也，物穢者拭其上使明，由他物而後明，猶加文于質上也。　又【禮·樂記】聲者，樂之象也。文采節奏，聲之飾也，故君子動其本，樂其象，然後治其飾。【註】以聲而被之器也。　又【詩·鄭風】羔裘豹飾。【註】飾，緣袖也。禮，君用純物，臣下之，故裘以豹皮爲飾也。　又【周禮·地官·封人】飾其牛牲。【註】刷治潔淸之也。一曰豫飾也。　又【禮·曲禮】飾羔鴈者以繢。【疏】飾，覆也。畫布爲雲氣，覆之以相見也。　又【禮·月令】天子乃厲飾。【註】厲飾謂戎服，尚威武也。　又【史記·公孫弘傳】習吏事，緣飾以儒術。【後漢·章帝紀】詔曰：俗吏矯飾外貌，似是而非，朕甚厭之。　又【周禮·夏官·掌固】設其飾器。【註】兵甲之屬。　又【正字通】滿飾，國名。　【說文】㕞也。从人从巾，食聲。讀若式，一曰橡飾。

考證：〔【周禮·地官·封人】飾其牛牲。【註】剝治潔淸之也。〕　謹照原文剝治改刷治
飾字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
飾字的起名意思

暂无。

[①]［shì］
["Guangyun" Appreciation, entry, book. ]
Traditional characters for "饰1". "饬2" was passed false characters. Also known as "餙1". Also known as "餝1".
(1) Wipe.
(2) Modification; decoration.
(3) Piping the collar and sleeves.
(4) Refers to the cuffs.
(5) Clothing.
(6) Jewelry; jewelry.
(7) Refers to treasures.
(8) "Zhuangzi · Horseshoe": "There is a problem with prong decoration before." Cheng Xuanying said: "Prong, title also. It is said that treasures are decorated in 镳镳." Lu Deming explained: "Sima Yun:'The row of titles is also.' It is said to be decorated with horse 镳." Then borrowed the title in the horse's mouth.
(9) Whitewash; camouflage.
(10) Still committed.
(11) Performance, display.
(12) Commendation; award decoration.
(13) Covered.
(14) Play.
[②]［chì］
["Jiyun" is full of strength, entry, thoroughness. ]
Traditional characters for "饰2". Same as "饬1". Also known as "餙2".
(1) Rectification; rectification.
(2) Correct; be cautious.
(3) Beware.

[Later Han·Zhangdiji] The edict said: The vulgar officials correct their appearance, which is specious, and I am very disgusted with it.　[Zhou Li·Xia Guan·Zhang Gu] set up its ornaments. [Note] Belonging to Bingjia.　[Zhengzitong] full of ornaments, country name.　【Said the text】㕞 also. From the person from the towel, to the sound of food. Read Ruo Shi, one is rubber ornaments. Textual research: [[Zhou Li·Diguan·Feng Ren】Decorated his cattle. [Note] Peel Zhi Jie Che also. 〕 　 I would like to remove the treatment according to the original text.

Old glyph
Decorate
Name meaning
Nothing.
shì, chì
вм. 饰
Radicals: 食, 巾  (eat, towel, gun)
Meaning Mnemonic
When you eat you want to see the shape of your gun from under a towel, so you decorate your house with them.
Just picture it: an entire home decorated top to bottom with guns covered in towels, so only the outline shows. As your guests try to eat you say, "Guess what gun this is?! Haha, you got it wrong, pull the towel back."
Reading Mnemonic
If you actually decorate your house like this it will give people quite a shock (しょく). In fact, they might be so shocked they run out of there screaming.
Maybe you should be more conscious of other people when you decorate. Or at least, don't shock people into fainting or yelling or leaving. Guns do that, you know?
